meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #659.

td.p: Kathleen Haider, a computer designer from Escondido, California
Bob Verini, a playwright and actor from New York City, New York
Marty Gertsman, a retail manager originally from Brooklyn, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,000)

tr.td: ANIMALS
MUSICAL MEMORIES
KITCHEN FIRSTS
SOUTH AFRICA
THE CIVIL WAR
"BEAN" BAG

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_4_5', 'clue_J_4_5_stuck', '(Marty: What is go elsewhere?)
(Kathleen: What is go in?)
...
(Alex: Bob doesn\'t want to try it.)
(Bob:Let me tell you something, I\'m not going to try it.)
(Alex: Let me give it to you, we caught you on that one, "here" means "men".)
(Bob: I\'d go in.)
(Alex: You\'d go in and if Kathleen went in, there\'d be a lot of trouble. Bob, select again.)
[End-of-round signal sounds.]

"here" means men, going in or elswhere would be dependant on one\'s gender

MartyKathleen
Triple Stumper
')
